"valueTip":undefined, "name":"switch", "value":true, "dataType":"bool", "uiType":"switch", "expanded":false, }, { "displayName":"ibxRadioGroupProperty", "displayValue":"Radio Group Property", "value":"radio_1"}, {"displayValue":"Radio 2", "value":"radio_2"}, {"displayValue":"Radio 3", "value":"radio_3"}, ], }, { "displayName":"ibxSelectProperty - Single", "displayValue":"Single Select Property", "nameTip":"Used for selecting a value from many.", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"select", "value":"select_1", "dataType":"string", "multiSelect":false, "uiType":"select", "expanded":false, "values": [ {"displayValue":"Select Item 1", "value":"select_1"}, {"displayValue":"Select Item 2", "value":"select_2"}, {"displayValue":"Select Item 3", "value":"select_3"}, ], }, { "dataType":"string", "multiSelect":true, "uiType":"select", "expanded":false, "values": [ {"displayValue":"Select Item 1", "value":"select_1"}, {"displayValue":"Select Item 2", "value":"select_2"}, {"displayValue":"Select Item 3", "value":"select_3"}, ], }, { "displayName":"ibxMenuProperty - Single", "displayValue":"Menu Property", "nameTip":"Used for selecting and item from a menu", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"menu", "value":"menu_1", "dataType":"string", "multiSelect":false, "uiType":"menu", "expanded":false, "values": [ {"displayValue":"Menu Item 1", "value":"menu_1"}, selecting and item from a menu", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"menu", "value":["menu_1", "menu_3"], "dataType":"string", "multiSelect":true, "uiType":"menu", "expanded":false, "values": [ {"displayValue":"Menu Item 1", "value":"menu_1"}, {"displayValue":"Menu Item 2", "value":"menu_2"}, {"displayValue":"Menu Item 3", "value":"menu_3"}, ], }, { "displayName":"ibxSliderProperty", "displayValue":"Slider Property", "nameTip":"Used for selecting value using a slider", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"slider", "value":50, "valueMin":0, "valueMax":100, "step":5, "dataType":"number", "uiType":"slider", "expanded":false, }, { "displayName":"ibxRangeSliderProperty", "displayValue":"Range Slider Property", "nameTip":"Used for selecting range of values using a slider", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"slider", "value":{"low":25, "high":75}, "valueMin":0, "valueMax":100, "step":5, "dataType":"number", "uiType":"rangeslider", "expanded":false, }, { "valueMax":100, "step":1, "dataType":"number", "uiType":"spinner", "expanded":false, }, { "displayName":"ibxColorPickerProperty", "displayValue":"Color Picker Property", "nameTip":"Used for setting "displayValue":"Date Property", "nameTip":"Used for setting dates.", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"date", "value":"11/04/1964", "format":"mm/dd/yy", "dataType":"date", "uiType":"date", "expanded":false, }, { "displayName":"ibxCssBorderProperty", "displayValue":"Css Border Property", "nameTip":"Used for setting css border values.", "valueTip":undefined, "name":"date", "value":{"width":"1px", "style":"solid", "color":"black"}, "dataType":"border", "uiType":"border", "expanded":false, }, ] //# sourceURL=propgrid_res.xml
